attributes.action: stop the controversial plans for firms to discriminate in favour of female and ethnic minorities job candidates
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Equality Minister Harriet Harman has proposed a controversial Equalities Bill that encourages firms to discriminate in favour of female and ethnic minorities job candidates.

This bill will create positive discrimination against white men. Please sign this petition if you're sick of this interfering government punishing the people who contribute most to this country.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
